NEWSLETTER_TITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Stay Ahead of the Ethereum Blockchain
TESTIMONIAL_SECTION_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER: See what users have to say about our Ethereum transaction monitoring app
TESTIMONIAL_1_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: I love being able to quickly find and track new Ethereum transactions as they happen. This app is a game-changer for anyone working with Ethereum data.
TESTIMONIAL_2_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: As an Ethereum researcher, this app provides invaluable insights into new transaction activity. The real-time updates and data visualization tools are incredibly useful.
TESTIMONIAL_3_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Monitoring new Ethereum transactions used to be a tedious manual process. This app has streamlined everything and made my job so much easier.
FAQ_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Find answers to common questions about our Ethereum transaction monitoring app
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_1: Our app allows you to monitor the Ethereum blockchain in real-time for new transactions. You can set filters to only track transactions relevant to your needs.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_2: How quickly are new transactions detected?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_2: Our system detects new Ethereum transactions within seconds of them being mined and added to the blockchain. You'll get near instant alerts for any transactions matching your filters.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_3: You can filter transactions by sender and recipient addresses, transaction value ranges, specific contract addresses, and more. This allows you to precisely track only the Ethereum activity you care about.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_4: You can receive alerts via email, SMS, web hooks, or integrate directly with our API from your own applications. Choose the delivery method that works best for your workflow.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_5: Yes, we offer a 14-day free trial with no credit card required. This allows you to fully test our Ethereum transaction monitoring capabilities before upgrading to a paid plan.

FEATURE_1_BODY: Stay ahead of the game with our cutting-edge technology that monitors the Ethereum blockchain in real-time, ensuring you never miss a single transaction.
FEATURE_2_BODY: Gain valuable insights into every transaction with our in-depth analysis, providing you with detailed information on senders, recipients, amounts, and more.
FEATURE_3_BODY: Tailor the app to your specific needs by setting up personalized alerts and notifications for transactions that match your criteria, keeping you informed at all times.
FEATURE_4_BODY: Navigate through our intuitive and sleek interface, designed to provide you with a seamless experience, making it easy to find and analyze the transactions you're interested in.
FEATURE_5_BODY: Rest assured that your data is safe with our robust security measures, ensuring the utmost privacy and protection for your valuable transaction information.
FEATURE_6_BODY: We are committed to delivering the best possible experience by continuously updating and improving our app, incorporating the latest advancements in blockchain technology.

PLACEHOLDER_FAQ_TITLE: Frequently Asked Questions About Ethereum Transaction Monitoring
ACCORDION_ANSWER_1: Ethereum transaction monitoring allows you to track new transactions happening on the Ethereum blockchain in real-time. This app will alert you whenever a new transaction takes place, giving you visibility into the latest activity.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_2: How does the app find new Ethereum transactions?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_2: The app connects directly to Ethereum nodes and listens for new blocks being added to the blockchain. When a new block contains transactions, the app parses the data and surfaces the new transactions to you.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_3: What types of transactions can I monitor?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_3: You can monitor all types of Ethereum transactions, including token transfers, smart contract deployments and executions, and simple ether transfers between wallets.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_4: Can I filter transactions by certain criteria?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_4: Yes, the app allows you to set filters to only surface transactions meeting specific criteria, such as transactions involving certain wallet addresses or smart contracts.
PAGE_DETAIL_1_VALUE: Stay ahead of the curve by monitoring the latest transactions on the Ethereum blockchain in real-time.
PAGE_DETAIL_2_VALUE: Get in-depth insights into each transaction, including the sender, recipient, amount transferred, and gas fees.
PAGE_DETAIL_3_VALUE: Set up personalized alerts to receive instant notifications for transactions matching your specified criteria.
